## Catalog of forecast submissions and evaluations {#sec-spatiotemporal-asset-catalog}

The catalog of submitted forecasts and the evaluation of the forecasts ("scores") is available through the SpatioTemporal Asset Catalogs browser (below).  A full page version can be found [here](https://radiantearth.github.io/stac-browser/#/external/raw.githubusercontent.com/LTREB-reservoirs/vera4cast/main/catalog/catalog.json)
